title: [Bug]: Window stays offscreen after unplugging a monitor
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the PWA?

Yes

### Describe the bug

When monitor, which displays the app, is disconnected, app remains offscreen

### What package are you using?

flatpak

### Version

1.12.6

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. Have 2 monitors, put Teams window on external monitor
2. Unplug the monitor
3. Resut: app is offscreen. When minimizing/maximixing, you can see it going away from screen. Only remedy is close/open the app again.
...
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1. App should detect being offscreen and move to main screen.
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

### Additional context

This happens everytime on my laptop, when I disconnect my external monitors.

Operating System: TUXEDO OS 
KDE Plasma Version: 6.2.5
KDE Frameworks Version: 6.10.0
Qt Version: 6.8.1
Kernel Version: 6.11.0-108013-tuxedo (64-bit)
Graphics Platform: Wayland
